text:
In a freak accident, two people were killed on Madhavaram High Road on Saturday. Kuberan (42), who was walking on the road, was knocked down by a container lorry. He died on the spot.

Anandraj (29), the driver of the lorry, rushed out of the vehicle to administer first-aid to Kuberan. However, he ended up stepping on a live cable and was electrocuted.

Police sources said investigations are on.
title: Lorry runs over pedestrian, driver rushes to help him, gets electrocuted
